languages.text: Эти "чудеса" были столь же причудливы, сколь и пугающи, и часто несли за собой смерть и разрушения.
Such "miracles" were as bizarre as they were terrifying and often resulted in death and destruction.
languages.original_text: Эти "чудеса" были столь же причудливы, сколь и пугающи, и часто несли за собой смерть и разрушения.

traits.locale_text: Such "miracles" were as peculiar, as they were dreadful, and often resulted in death and destruction.
Such "miracles" were as peculiar, as they were dreadful, and often resulted in death and destruction.
Such "miracles" were as peculiar as they were dreadful and often resulted in death and destruction.
Such "miracles" were as peculiar as they were dreadful and often resulted in death and destruction.
Such "miracles" were as bizarre as they were terrifying and often resulted in death and destruction.
Such "miracles" were as bizarre as they were terrifying and often resulted in death and destruction.

languages.text: 这样的“奇迹”既诡异、又恐怖，常常会招致死亡与毁灭。
languages.original_text: Such "miracles" were as bizarre as they were terrifying and often resulted in death and destruction.

traits.locale_text: 这样的“奇迹”既诡异、又可怕，常常会招致死亡与毁灭。

languages.text: Solche "Wunder" waren so bizarr wie grauenhaft und führten oft zu Tod und Zerstörung.
languages.original_text: Such "miracles" were as bizarre as they were terrifying and often resulted in death and destruction.

traits.locale_text: Solche "Wunder" waren sonderbar, da sie grauenhaft waren und oft zu Tod und Zerstörung führten.

languages.text: Ces « miracles » étaient aussi étranges qu'épouvantables, entraînant souvent mort et destruction.
languages.original_text: Such "miracles" were as bizarre as they were terrifying and often resulted in death and destruction.

traits.locale_text: Ces « miracles » étaient aussi étranges qu’épouvantables, entraînant souvent mort et destruction.

languages.text: Dichos «milagros» eran tan peculiares como aterradores y tendían a acabar causando muerte y destrucción.
languages.original_text: Such "miracles" were as bizarre as they were terrifying and often resulted in death and destruction.

traits.locale_text: Dichos «milagros» eran tan peculiares como terribles y tendían a acabar causando muerte y destrucción.

languages.text: そのような「奇跡」は奇妙であると同時に恐ろしいものとして、しばしば死と破壊をもたらした。
languages.original_text: Such "miracles" were as bizarre as they were terrifying and often resulted in death and destruction.

traits.locale_text: そのような「奇跡」は奇妙であると同時に恐ろしいものとして、しばしば死と破壊をもたらした。

languages.text: Bu tip "mucizeler", tuhaf oldukları kadar dehşet vericiydi. Zira sıklıkla ölüme ve yıkıma neden oluyorlardı.
languages.original_text: Such "miracles" were as bizarre as they were terrifying and often resulted in death and destruction.

traits.locale_text: Bu tip "mucizeler" tuhaf oldukları kadar dehşet vericiydi de ve sıklıkla ölüme ve yıkıma neden oluyordu.
